Outline

  • Module Jobs

Module Documents

The module Admin has the following documents defined:
Document Documentation
Audit
ChangePassword
Communication
CommunicationTemplate
Configuration
Contact
Content
ControlPanel
DataGroup
DataMaintenance
DocumentCreator
DocumentNumber
DownloadFolder
DynamicEntityA JSON representation of scalar fields and embedded relations with a collection of related dynamic beans. The Dynamic Entities are upserted with the same bizId as its static counterpart when there is a mix. So this is manipulated outside of Hibernate O/R mapping.
DynamicRelationRepresents a relation - ie a database joining table or foereign key (association or collection). There can be multiple rows with the same attribute name for multiple cardinality relations. The Dynamic Relations are upserted with the same bizId as its static counterpart when there is a mix. So this is manipulated outside of Hibernate O/R mapping.
GenericThis document is used as the driving document for List and Tree models. It has a parent document of itself so that it will work in a treeGrid. Also there ara a bunch of generic columns to bind to.
Group
GroupRole
ImportExport
ImportExportColumn
Job
JobSchedule
Jobs
ModuleDocumentNon-persistent document used to store a selection of a document belonging to a specific module. This allows it to be used in a lookupDescription, e.g. Control Panel - Generate Test Data, or when refreshing documents as part of DataMaintenance.
ReportDatasetReport Dataset is used to capture data which is injected into a report template. This can be a BizQL or SQL query, or a string constant.
ReportDesign
ReportManager

The Report Manager document provides functions to manage system Report Templates and Report Configurations.

ReportParameter

Report Parameters are used to define a parameter which is injected into a ReportDataset when a report is executed. Report Paramters sit at the template level, so that a single parameter can be reused for multiple datasets, e.g. 'dateFrom'.

The test values are used when testing a report from a Report Template, and when running a report from a Report Configuration, the default value or input values are used.

ReportTemplate

The Report Template document is for report administrator users to create reports using a template.

Report Template is persisted to the same table as a Report Configuration, so the template is always linked to the correct configuration record for the report.

SelfRegistration
SelfRegistrationActivation
Snapshot
StartupThis document provides a visual way to edit the JSON configuration and is shown to the administrator by default on first login.
SubscriptionA subscription Preference models the receiver's preference about how they wish to receive the communication type (or not). If the subscription is declined, the format type is not required. If the format type is supplied, then the communication is only declined for that format. If the subscription is not declined, the format type is required, as this specifies the format preference for the communication. If the subscription is not declined and has no formatType, the subscription can be deleted as it holds no value. Subscriptions are user-scoped - The assumption is that it is up to the user whether they wish to accept or decline receiving communications and in what manner they are delivered.
SystemDashboard
Tag
Tagged
User
UserCandidateContactUser Candidate Contact is a transient child of User, and holds the potential matching contacts when a search is conducted during the Create User wizard.
When creating a new user, the wizard offers the opportunity to establish if the new user account corresponds to an existing contact, via a basic search facility (name and/or email).
Possible (i.e. candidate) matches (and their match scores) are presented via the wizard for selection or alternatively, a new contact is created if required.
UserDashboard
UserList
UserLoginRecord
UserMonthlyHits
UserProxyA proxy version of the admin.User (without roles and groups etc) used for referencing.
UserRole
UserToken

Roles

The module Admin has the following roles defined:
Field Description Doumentation
AnonymousAccess anonymous (not signed in) public features
AppUserManage own contact details and passwordThe App User role is intended for retail and public users interacting through the "front office". These users are assumed to operate within their own scope and have only visibility to their own data. App Users can create their own contacts, and change their own passwords. App Users can execute reports if given access via another module.
AuditManagerManage the activity audit log
BasicUserGeneral access to the administration moduleThe intention of Basic User role is to provide basic capability to back-office users. The role is for a typical office situation where users collaborate within the "Customer" scope on key application areas. For example, shared contact management, common document number serials and the ability to use Skyve's basic personal efficiency and automation capabilities, Tags, Snapshots, Communication and view dashboards. BasicUser can know of the existence of other users and refer to them, but cannot change their user record.
ContactManagerManage contact details and interactionsAllows atomic control over management of, and interaction with, contacts.
ContactViewerView-only access to contact detailsAllows atomic control over visibility of contacts.
DevOpsGenerate Skyve designs and metadata and administer technical aspects of the Skyve runtime
JobMaintainerMaintain JobsAllows atomic control over the ability to schedule jobs and review job progress.
SecurityAdministratorAllows administration of Users and GroupsAdministration of users and permissions.
ViewUserView-only access to the administration moduleThe view user is intended as a read-only office user, with visibility as per Basic User role.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Dynamic Entities

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Overview

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A JSON representation of scalar fields and embedded relations with a collection of related dynamic beans. The Dynamic Entities are upserted with the same bizId as its static counterpart when there is a mix. So this is manipulated outside of Hibernate O/R mapping.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Dynamic Entities have the following attributes:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Attribute Name Display Name Type Size Required Persistent Values Deprecated

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Dynamic Relations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  DynamicRelation is a child of DynamicEntity

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Overview

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Represents a relation - ie a database joining table or foereign key (association or collection). There can be multiple rows with the same attribute name for multiple cardinality relations. The Dynamic Relations are upserted with the same bizId as its static counterpart when there is a mix. So this is manipulated outside of Hibernate O/R mapping.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Dynamic Relations have the following attributes:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Attribute Name Display Name Type Size Required Persistent Description Documentation Values Deprecated
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  relatedModuleNameModule Nametext128falsetruePopulated with the related document's module name if the dynamic relation is to a static document.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    		false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    relatedDocumentNameDocument Nametext128falsetruePopulated with the related document's name if the dynamic relation is to a static document.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      		false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      relatedIdRelated IDidtruetrueThe ID for the related dynamic entity (admin.DynamicEntity) OR a real entity.This is an ID because it may be related to a static entity. It also makes schema evolution easier as deletes will remove everything related.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        		false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        attributeNameAttribute Nametext500truetrueThe attribute name of this relation.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          		false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ordinalOrdinalintegerfalsetrueUsed for ordered collections (akin to bizOrdinal)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            		false

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Loading strategy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Create related records if they don't exist (recommended)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  With this option, uploaded records will be created but where these reference other records, they will only be created if a match can't be found

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Create everything even if there might be duplicates
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  With this option, new records will always be created

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Create related records if they don't exist (createFind)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Create everything even if there might be duplicates (createAll)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  		false

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Module Documents

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Overview

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Non-persistent document used to store a selection of a document belonging to a specific module. This allows it to be used in a lookupDescription, e.g. Control Panel - Generate Test Data, or when refreshing documents as part of DataMaintenance.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Report Datasets

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ReportDataset is a child of ReportTemplate

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Overview

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Report Dataset is used to capture data which is injected into a report template. This can be a BizQL or SQL query, or a string constant.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Report Datasets have the following attributes:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Attribute Name Display Name Type Size Required Persistent Description Values Usage Deprecated
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  datasetNameDataset Nametext50truetrueThe name this dataset will be made available to within the report definition.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    		false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    datasetTypeDataset Typeenumeration8truetrueThe type of this dataset; if it is a BizQL or SQL query, a fixed constant value or a dataset Class.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • BizQL (BizQL)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • SQL (SQL)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Constant (Constant)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Class (Class)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    		false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    queryQuerymemotruetrueThe query to retrieve this dataset for the report.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      		false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      resultsQuery ResultsmemofalsefalseResults of testing the query.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        		viewfalse

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Conditions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Report Datasets have the following conditions specified:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Name Description
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        typeClassTrue when the dataset type is a class, used to hide the results ouput
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        typeConstantTrue when the dataset type is a constant, used to hide the parameters datagrid
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        typeQueryTrue when the dataset type is a BizQL or SQL, used to show the parameters datagrid
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        typeSqlQueryTrue when the dataset type is SQL, used to show help to the user

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        UniqueConstraints

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Report Datasets have the following uniqueness constraints specified:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        UniqueDatasetNamecustomerDataset Name, parent

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Report Manager

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Overview

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The Report Manager document provides functions to manage system Report Templates and Report Configurations.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Report Manager have the following attributes:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Attribute Name Display Name Type Size Required Persistent Documentation Values Deprecated
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                pathToZipPath to Ziptext500falsefalseThe path of the zip of report configurations for download
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  		false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  importActionTypeImport actionenumeration8truefalse
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Validate only report configurations and templates (validate)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Validate then import report configurations and templates (import)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  		false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  currentReportsCurrent Reportscollectionfalsefalse
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    		false

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    References

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Report Manager have the following references to other documents:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Reference Type Document Required Deprecated
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Current ReportscollectionReportTemplatefalsefalse

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Actions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • ExportReportSpecifications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • ImportReportSpecifications

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Report Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ReportParameter is a child of ReportTemplate

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Overview

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Report Parameters are used to define a parameter which is injected into a ReportDataset when a report is executed. Report Paramters sit at the template level, so that a single parameter can be reused for multiple datasets, e.g. 'dateFrom'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The test values are used when testing a report from a Report Template, and when running a report from a Report Configuration, the default value or input values are used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Report Parameters have the following attributes:
